title: Mathematics Education Module for Identifying Design Patterns in International Collaborative Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Developing culturally responsive mathematical problem-solving strategies in a smartphone-based, restricted technological environment.

learning_goals: Learners can identify five types of mathematical problems that occur in international collaborative environments
Learners can apply three design patterns for solving mathematical problems that consider cultural contexts
Learners can complete mathematical problem-solving projects using collaboration tools in mobile environments
Learners can reconstruct the design pattern development process (problem definition → solution proposal → result analysis) for international collaborative learning contexts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
